Is one of these missing features perhaps the part after you press the "go"
button and expect to start fighting stuff.  when I click go it sends me back to
the desktop  : (  doesn't seem to matter which of the 3 files I run.  Lemme
know if I'm missing something obvious about installing the thing ( you just
unzip it right).  And yes I do have directX.  heh, phat toonz though :)
